Release Notes¶

Version 0.1.7¶

Fixed memory leak

  • Fixed memory leak in intersect_from_array()

  • Fixed memory leak in intersect()

Frozen status

  • Ability to make AIList immutable with freeze()

Method additions

  • Added ability to index with iterables

  • downsample()

  • bin_sums()

  • bin_means()

Documentation overhaul

  • Creation of documentation for AIList

  • Creation of documentation for Interval
